review: The Fire Stick is extremely easy to use and setup, we had no problems setting it up straight out of the box. I am amazed at the speed at which it operates, and the remote is slick and controls are easy to use. Even compared to a smart blu ray player, this is much faster and easier to use, and doesn't take up any space! Its also 100000 better than the Chromecast which requires another device to stream the media.
